portfolio/API-docs.title: Web3 | DeFi | Blockchain | APIs
portfolio/API-docs.description: APIs are not just tools for integration. With the growth of microservices they are strategic assets that can significantly enhance the functionality and offering of a business or service. Great API docs should showcase the ease and effortlessness of your API service.

portfolio/developer-experience.title: Developer Experience (DX), Relations and Marketing
portfolio/developer-experience.description: Developer Relations is a blend between customer success and product. It encompasses developer education, marketing, developer experience and developer success. However, typically people who are great at marketing and social media don't have strong technical skills and vice versa.

portfolio/media.title: Creative approaches without text
portfolio/media.description: Explaining tricky concepts can use up a lot of words without engaging the reader.

research/game-theory/ostrom-games-cpr.title: The Elinor Ostrom approach
research/game-theory/ostrom-games-cpr.description: Elinor Ostrom took game theory models, combined them with her Institutional Analysis and Development framework before adding 500g of her bounded rationality enforcement.

research/game-theory/prisoners-dilemma.title: The Prisoners dilemma
research/game-theory/prisoners-dilemma.description: The Prisoners dilemma game is conceptualised as a non-cooperative game where all players have complete information. There is no communication.
